meteoroids.Meteoroids.gameobjects

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.gameobjects.GameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPosition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrawableGameObject, DUGameObject, UpdateableGameObject

    public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPosition
    Basic GameObject. Almost every thing drawn in the screen is a GameObject with a specific position.
    Author:
    vpyyhtia

      • setKeepInsideWindow

        public void setKeepInsideWindow(boolean keepInWindow)
        Sets tha keepInsideWindow parameter to true if object has to be kept inside the window. Usually used for player's ship when it flies from other border to the other.
        Parameters:
        keepInWindow - true if keep object inside the window
